de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends DrawableAnimation,BuilderType extends DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
  • Type Parameters:
    AnimationType - The type of the animations, which are created by the builder
    BuilderType - The type of the builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder, ScaleTransitionAnimation.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    DrawableAnimation

    protected abstract static class DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends DrawableAnimation,BuilderType extends DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>
extends AbstractBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
    An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create animations, which can be used to change drawables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change drawables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BuilderType setDuration(int duration)
      Sets the duration of the animation, which is created by the builder.
      BuilderType setListener(DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener listener)
      Sets the listener, which should be notified about the progress of the animation, which is created by the builder.

      • Methods inherited from class de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder

        create, getContext, getProduct, onCreateProduct, self, setContext

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder

        protected AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder(@NonNull
                                           android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change drawables.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the builder, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • setDuration

        public BuilderType setDuration(int duration)
        Sets the duration of the animation, which is created by the builder.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration, which should be set, in milliseconds as an Integer value. The duration must be at least 1
        Returns:
        The builder, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType

      • setListener

        public BuilderType setListener(@Nullable
                               DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener listener)
        Sets the listener, which should be notified about the progress of the animation, which is created by the builder.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be set, as an instance of the type DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener or null, if no listener should be notified
        Returns:
        The builder, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType
